items.name: Berek's Pass
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 27 Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
flavourText: "From Frost's ice-bound pass
Berek taunted and jeered
Until furious Flame scaled the mountain
Berek escaped through the thaw
And Frost's tortured moans."
- Berek and the Untamed

items.name: Oblivion Ward
explicitMods: 15% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
You can apply an additional Curse
Attacks have +1.48% to Critical Strike Chance
Enemies you Kill Explode, dealing 3% of their Life as Physical Damage
enchantMods: Grants +1 to Maximum Life per 2% Quality

explicitMods:
Immune to Poison during Flask Effect
Removes Poison on use
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Contract: Breaking the Unbreakable
items.descrText: Give this Contract to Adiyah in the Rogue Harbour to embark on the Heist.
flavourText: ...the blueprints for my Extreme Warmth Beam, my Storm Wooing Rod,
the Mind Sublimator, and the Unbreakable...!

items.name: Soul Catcher
explicitMods: 92% increased Damage with Vaal Skills during effect
Vaal Skills require 25% reduced Souls Per Use during effect
Vaal Skills used during effect have 39% reduced Soul Gain Prevention Duration
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Freedom is for the privileged, even in death.
<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of the Ghost}

items.name: Ancient Dwelling
explicitMods: Magic Monster Packs each have a Bloodline Mod
Found Items have 10% chance to drop Corrupted in Area
Area is inhabited by the Vaal
Players have 15% less Area of Effect
fracturedMods: Rare Monsters each have a Nemesis Mod
items.descrText: Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.

items.name: Fate Curio
explicitMods: 3% chance to receive additional Breach items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
6% chance to receive additional Weapons when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
7% chance in Heists for Orbs of Augmentation to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.name: Pledge of Hands
implicitMods: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Greater Spell Echo
flavourText: "To shake a hand is to double your power."
- Jaetai, Queen's Advisor

items.name: Phoenix Glimmer
explicitMods: 12% increased Attack Damage while holding a Shield
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.typeLine: Lingering Platinum Tirn's End Watchstone of Progress
explicitMods: Monsters and Chests in Areas have 3% chance to drop Items with +1 to Item Level
Tormented Spirits in Areas have 45% increased Duration
items.descrText: Socket this into a Citadel on your Atlas to increase the Tier of Maps and reveal hidden Maps in that Citadel's Region. You can only socket one Crimson, Viridian, Cobalt or Golden Watchstone into each Citadel.
flavourText: Only the souls trapped within can bear witness to the Maven's dark proclivities, and they dare not speak up.

items.name: Forsaken Shadows
explicitMods: Monsters have 70% chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments
All Monster Damage from Hits always Ignites
Monsters' Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value
items.descrText: Travel to this Map by using it in a personal Map Device. Maps can only be used once.

items.name: Paradoxica
explicitMods: Attacks with this Weapon deal Double Damage
craftedMods: 17% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: What has no siblings but is always a twin?

items.name: Empyrean March
explicitMods: You have Tailwind if you have dealt a Critical Strike Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 217 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 2.9 Mana per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Spirit Blast
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 18 Cast On Critical Strike

items.name: Phoenix Trap
explicitMods: 34% increased Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies
35% increased Spell Damage during any Flask Effect
enchantMods: Elemental Ailments inflicted on Enemies Exposed by you have 20% increased Duration
cosmeticMods: Has Maligaro's Restraint Skin. You can reclaim this by shift-clicking this item.

items.name: Martyr of Innocence
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: +14% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
Damage Penetrates 15% of Fire Resistance if you have Blocked Recently
Immune to Freeze and Chill while Ignited
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
flavourText: You have been found guilty.
Let the fires cleanse you of your sins.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 20% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 10000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Vaal, Attack, AoE, Duration, Slam, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a short duration. Cracks created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
explicitMods: Aftershock deals 150% more Damage with Hits and Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
Aftershock deals 350% more Damage with Hits and Ailments
hybrid.secDescrText: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a short duration. After using this skill, your steps will deal damage around you, cracking the earth if the previous cracks have erupted. This effect ends after a secondary duration, or after a maximum number of aftershocks. Requires an Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.

items.name: Armageddon Urge
explicitMods: Monsters take 36% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes
Monsters gain an Endurance Charge on Hit
All Monster Damage from Hits always Ignites
items.descrText: Can be used in a personal Map Device. Modifiers to Item Quantity will affect the number of encounter rewards dropped.
flavourText: For those who must not endure it,
there may be found a perverse joy
in watching the struggle for survival.

implicitMods:
Area is infested with Fungal Growths
Map's Item Quantity Modifiers also affect Blight Chest count at 20% value
Natural inhabitants of this area have been removed
enchantMods: Blight Monsters in Areas spawn 6% faster

items.name: Behemoth Implement

properties.name: Any Heist member can equip this item.

items.descrText: Can only be equipped to Heist members.
Combine this with four other different samples in Tane's Laboratory.
Right-click to add this prophecy to your character.
flavourText: The Red Queen holds the key to her vaults, and only death will loosen her grip.
items.prophecyText: You will slay Atziri, Queen of the Vaal, and gain access to her Vaults.

items.name: Hypnotic Orders
explicitMods: Monsters have 368% increased Critical Strike Chance
items.descrText: Give this Contract to Adiyah in the Rogue Harbour to embark on the Heist.
flavourText: "Those Eternal bastards looted everything that wasn't bolted to the floor when we
finally drove them from our island! That candelabra belongs with us!"

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 30% less Projectile Speed
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Projectile Damage
Supported Skills deal 29% more Projectile Damage
items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
Can be used in a personal Map Device.
flavourText: The Vaal shall never fear the setting of our sun.

explicitMods: Stores the monsters slain for the first time from a completed Ritual Altar for future use
items.descrText: Right-click this item then left-click a Ritual Altar to store the monsters from the completed Ritual in this item. Cannot be used on a Ritual in a map opened with a Blood-Filled Vessel.
Travel to Esh's Domain by using this item in a personal Map Device. Can only be used once.
Can be used in a personal Map Device to add modifiers to a Map.
flavourText: Though you were swallowed by your own darkness, you saved countless others
from eternal misery, young Tsarsk. You were not nothing, as you feared.

explicitMods: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it.

explicitMods: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.

explicitMods: Upgrades a normal item to rare or reforges a rare item, guaranteeing one property
One Handed Weapon: Damage Penetrates 8% Fire Resistance
Two Handed Weapon: Damage Penetrates (15-16)% Fire Resistance
items.descrText: Right click this item then left click a normal or rare item to apply it.

- Beryl, Survivor from the Azurite Mines

Deals 20% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 20% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage

Sacrifices 60% of your total Energy Shield and Life

hybrid.secDescrText: Sacrifices a portion of your Life and Energy Shield to engulf you in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies for a duration. Your spell damage is increased while under this effect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines.
explicitMods: Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 19 Mana with a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 12% more Spell Damage
Arcane Surge grants 11% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 0.5% of Mana Regenerated per second
